Instrument.name: The Miniature Integrated Camera Spectrometer (MICAS) for Deep Space 1
Instrument.description: The Miniature Integrated Camera Spectrometer (MICAS) instrument package consisted of an integrated multi-channel instrument with two visible-wavelength imagers, a visual CCD (VISCCD), an active pixel sensor (APS), and two imaging spectrometers - one short-wavelength infrared (SWRI) and one ultraviolet (UV). MICAS imaging was also used for autonomous navigation.
